alert.note: Alert for Box Butte (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 25 at 3:38AM CST until December 27 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of up to 2 to 5 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Box Butte County including Alliance. * WHEN...5 PM MST Monday until 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous or impossible travel conditions due to icy, snow packed roads and near zero visibilities in falling and blowing snow.
info.instruction: Prepare for possible blizzard conditions. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
